trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The CustomizeLegendEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event.
trans-unit.target: A classe de CustomizeLegendEventArgs é utilizada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: There are only two properties in this class.
trans-unit.target: Existem apenas duas propriedades desta classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A> property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items, and to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A>propriedade permite-lhe eliminar ou modificar predefinido e itens de legenda personalizados e adicionar os itens de legenda personalizados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to change the order of legend items.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade também pode ser utilizada para alterar a ordem dos itens de legenda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A> property is used to identify the legend that raised this event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A>propriedade é utilizada para identificar a legenda que originou este evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> and legend name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"> </xref> e o nome da legenda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The legend name.
trans-unit.target: O nome da legenda.

trans-unit.source: Used to remove, modify or change the order of both custom and default legend items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Utilizado para remover, modificar ou alterar a ordem de ambos os personalizada e predefinidos itens de legenda no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Can also be used to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: Também pode ser utilizado para adicionar itens de legenda personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The LegendItems property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event, and to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade LegendItems permite-lhe eliminar ou modificar predefinido e itens de legenda personalizados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>evento e para adicionar itens de legenda personalizados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: The order of legend items can also be changed.
trans-unit.target: Também é possível alterar a ordem dos itens de legenda.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> and [LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) properties can be used to determine the data element that is associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>e [LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) propriedades podem ser utilizadas para determinar o elemento de dados que está associado um item de legenda predefinido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties will return zero-length strings for custom legend items, because custom items are not associated with chart data.
trans-unit.target: Estas propriedades devolverá cadeias de comprimento de zero para itens de legenda personalizados, dado que itens personalizados não são associados com dados do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> the event was raised for, which enables you to customize an individual [Legend](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade permite-lhe determinar qual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>o evento foi gerado, que lhe permite personalizar um indivíduo [legenda](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object, which can be used to determine which legend was the sender of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> objeto, que pode ser utilizado para determinar que legenda foi o remetente do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valor que representa o nome de associada <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> objeto.
